name: Jay Lives Through the Day: A Fanfiction: The Game
name_original: Jay Lives Through the Day: A Fanfiction: The Game
description:
Several years ago, a young man named Milo wrote a very bad Marble Hornets fanfic. Severaler years later, I made it a very bad game. Four different endings, which is four times as many as the original! And that's terrible. It takes place sometime in Season 2, I guess? No spoilers.

Warnings and disclaimers: Contains alcohol use, drug mentions, fighting in parking lots, fandom in-jokes, and pro gaming. I don't own Marble Hornets. If you've never watched Marble Hornets: a) you should because it's really good, and b) don't play this game because it will make no sense to you.
